alert.note: Alert for Allen; Neosho (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 3:27PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Neosho and south central Allen Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 326 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southeast of Humboldt. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Neosho and south central Allen Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
